title: myTime Watch Face Lite
summary: myTime Watch Face Lite is a simple and clean standalone watch face with calendar
description: Designed for Round and Square devices.Android Wear 2.0 Complications support.Customize your watch face directly on the watch, in a easy and fast way.If you want to change the background color, for example, you won't need to pick up yourphone, unlock, open the watch face app or Android Wear app, change the background color and then go back to the watch. You can change by long pressing the watch screen, myTime configurationsand then choose a background color.Simple, easy and fast.myTime Watch Face Lite Features:- 1 space for Complication (Android Wear 2.0)- Date (Day / Month)- Calendar with one color- Watch Battery- 7 Background Colors- 6 Fonts for Numbers- 8 Colors for Numbers and Markers- 5 Styles for Markers- A few Styles and Colors for Hour and Minute Hands- A few Fonts and Colors for Digital WatchAmbient Mode   Ambient Mode Settings:      - Date      - Watch Battery      - Mobile Battery (Only in Full Version)      - Digital Watch       - Analog Watch
descriptionHTML:
Designed for Round and Square devices.

Android Wear 2.0 Complications support.

Customize your watch face directly on the watch, in a easy and fast way.

If you want to change the background color, for example, you won't need to pick up your
phone, unlock, open the watch face app or Android Wear app, change the background color and
then go back to the watch. You can change by long pressing the watch screen, myTime configurations
and then choose a background color.
Simple, easy and fast.

myTime Watch Face Lite Features:

- 1 space for Complication (Android Wear 2.0)

- Date (Day / Month)

- Calendar with one color

- Watch Battery

- 7 Background Colors

- 6 Fonts for Numbers

- 8 Colors for Numbers and Markers

- 5 Styles for Markers

- A few Styles and Colors for Hour and Minute Hands

- A few Fonts and Colors for Digital Watch


Ambient Mode
Ambient Mode Settings:
- Date
- Watch Battery
- Mobile Battery (Only in Full Version)
- Digital Watch
- Analog Watch
comments: Love the watch face. Nice and minimal design. Could you please support complications also? 4 complications would be nice then I could make this my daily watch face. Also a notification dot / indicator would be a nice feature. A lot of new watch faces around play store have the same implemented into them. Thanks and great work!
Nice so far. Needs complications and would like to hide the second hand. Would buy the full version if it had at least those.
This watch face looks fantastic on my Sony SW3. It has very visible face, time , date, battery level.lovely colour. Perfect saving mode. Just perfect
This watchface is great on my Ticwatch 2. I love the simplistic design. I really wanted an analog & digital watchface and this works great
